name: Evolution Surge, Greater
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as lesser evolution surge (see above), except that you can grant any two evolutions whose total cost does not exceed 6 evolution points.
text_zh: 类似于次级激励进化 (Evolution Surge, Lesser)，但是你能给予两项总和不超过六点进化点的进化。
